hero.hello: Hi, I'm Alex A Full-stack Web Developer
hero.name: Alex
hero.p: I'm a full-stack web developer specializing in building (and occasionally designing) exceptional digital experiences. Currently I'm focused on building responsive full stack web applications.

about.p_1: My name is Alex, and I enjoy creating beautiful and functional web applications! I specialize in Front-End development but I'm also capable of working on the Back-End. I'm proficient in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, as well as popular frameworks like React and Redux.
about.p_2: I also have the necessary skills to work with back-end technologies such as Node.js, Express, and databases, which allows me to create full-stack applications from start to finish. I am constantly learning and strive to use the most modern technologies in my projects.
